Multi Page Markup

This is the starting build of Gulp 4 and Vanilla JS for the markup of multi-page websites without additional frameworks, such as Vue, React and others.

Page 1Page 2
  • Autoprefixer
  • Creating a zip-archive of the production folder
  • Convenient and intuitive file structure
  • Easy addition of new pages
  • Component approach at the HTML level
  • HTML fragmentation - creating reusable pieces of code
  • SCSS preprocessor for style
  • Image minimization + format conversion .jpg, .jpeg, .png in .webp
  • The ability to use modules in JS (import/export)
  • Creating minified js/css bundles for each individual page
